stepAnswer: 3.6 lbs Bermuda seed and 5.4 lbs Fescue seed
stepTitle: Riley is planning to plant a lawn in his yard. He will need nine pounds of grass seed. He wants to mix Bermuda seed that costs $4.80 per pound with Fescue seed that costs $3.50 per pound. How much of each seed should he buy so that the overall cost will be $4.02 per pound?
choices: 3.6 lbs Bermuda seed and 5.4 lbs Fescue seed
4.3 lbs Bermuda seed and 4.7 lbs Fescue seed
2 lbs Bermuda seed and 3.4 lbs Fescue seed
1.2 lbs Bermuda seed and 7.3 lbs Fescue seed
